alert.note: Alert for Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 01 at 9:02PM EDT until September 05 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St. Marks River near Newport On Old Magnolia Rd affecting Leon and Wakulla Counties. For the St. Marks River...including Newport On Old Magnolia Rd... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St. Marks River near Newport On Old Magnolia Rd. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water begins to flood yards of some residences of homes near Old Magnolia Road in Wakulla County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.0 feet on 10/10/1996. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 315 PM EDT.
